lyrics:
"She A Soldier" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "She A Soldier" (feat. Rich Homie Quan) Baby whip the dope like I told you Never let a nigga fuck you over Stay down, I'm a put you in a Rover You better never tell nobody what I showed you You a soldier, you a soldier Beauty in the eye of the beholder She a wild alley cat, Villanova I pray to God, don't fuck, don't pull her over It ain't 'bout the sex, it's all about the soldier I won't care less bout the money but my soldier I lost a bum, I lost the pick, I lost my soldier She a down bitch, a motherfucking soldier 15 K today, 30 K tomorrow, nigga I live life on boats, ain't gonna spazz about nothing, nigga Everything I say's a quote, I done took all for default Got a dough bag in my throat, I'll try my best not to choke We gonna take that fucking paper to the ceiling Zero tolerance for these bitches, they just want chill'in I made a pledge to Mego to take on all my nephews and nieces Then ran into my mego he turned to a fucking receiver I'm receiving, you know I'm cricket like ' I'm a freak, I get them packing, take all the clothes off they body I know bitches, they gonna come and fuck you and take all your riches I know mouth, Quan, man, Gucci spending nothing but digits, get it Baby whip the dope like I told you Never let a nigga fuck you over Stay down, I'm a put you in a Rover You better never tell nobody what I showed you You a soldier, you a soldier Beauty in the eye of the beholder She a wild alley cat, Villanova I pray to God, don't fuck, don't pull her over It ain't 'bout the sex, it's all about the soldier I won't care less bout the money but my soldier I lost a bum, I lost the pick, I lost my soldier She a down bitch, a motherfucking soldier Now she been riding with the nigga for some years Cried a river without a tear, even avoid a couple kids 'I thought you would've left me, hold down on my dick But you were still there to help you, you the chef that kept me fit You see, I ain't scared to say it, there was nothing, just to play it So I was shooting for the head and I ain't moving for no feds Watching every move and know my whereabouts Finally I make more, fake hoes don't care about It's like four niggas try to share a house, it ain't gonna work, I make 'em tear it down Get that eviction notice, grip the 40, might let them niggas have it Scooter and Gucci, you know we causing havoc Baby whip the dope like I told you Never let a nigga fuck you over Stay down, I'm a put you in a Rover You better never tell nobody what I showed you You a soldier, you a soldier Beauty in the eye of the beholder She a wild alley cat, Villanova I pray to God, don't fuck, don't pull her over It ain't 'bout the sex, it's all about the soldier I went careless bout the money but my soldier I lost a bum, I lost the pick, I lost my soldier She a down bitch, a motherfucking soldier Stand and salute like I told you to Pistol in the purse like a soldier do She got the brains and the body and the muscle too I give a shout out to these bitches 'cause they hustlers, too Soldier, soldier, baby girl a soldier Put over, Corola, she did what I told her Don't give a damn if they sell her ass to Angola My girlfriend thick, lips look like Crayola Seven times paying bribes, call her she pay all Cocaine, Coca Cola, curse them with them' I'm 'with OJ in yeah we got them boulders I call that bitch lieutenant 'because that bitch a soldier Baby whip the dope like I told you Never let a nigga fuck you over Stay down, I'm a put you in a Rover You better never tell nobody what I showed you You a soldier, you a soldier Beauty in the eye of the beholder She a wild alley cat, Villanova I pray to God, don't fuck, don't pull her over It ain't 'bout the sex, it's all about the soldier I went careless bout the money but my soldier I lost a bum, I lost the pick, I lost my
